description: Enterprise techniques used by Poseidon Group, ATT&CK group G0033 v1.0
name: Poseidon Group (G0033)

techniques.comment: [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) obtains and saves information about victim network interfaces and addresses.
[Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) tools attempt to spoof anti-virus processes as a means of self-defense.
The [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033)'s Information Gathering Tool (IGT) includes PowerShell components.
After compromising a victim, [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) discovers all running services.
After compromising a victim, [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) lists all running processes.
[Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) conducts credential dumping on victims, with a focus on obtaining credentials belonging to domain and database servers.
[Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) searches for administrator accounts on both the local victim machine and the network.
